overview:
Kim Wiencken has significant experience from both the software and venture capital industry. Kim has worked as an advisor for a number of European venture capital managers and in particular with venture backed ICT companies in Scandinavia and Germany. Kim is further part of the Faculty at Scandinavian International Management Institute, where he advises companies on growth and development issues.

Previously Kim has held senior positions in SAP, Oracle, and Deloitte Consulting and has through these positions a strong insight into the ICT sector.
